# INRequestPaymentPayerResolutionResult

**Class**

A resolution result for the person making the payment.

## Declaration

```swift
class INRequestPaymentPayerResolutionResult
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRequestPaymentPayerResolutionResult] object is what you return when resolving parameters containing an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPerson] object. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to resolve the parameter successfully.

For additional resolution options, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPersonResolutionResult] and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **unsupported(forReason:)**: Creates an object whose resolution indicates that the specified value is not supported.
- **INRequestPaymentPayerUnsupportedReason**: Constants indicating the reason for being unable to resolve the provider of the funds.
- **init(personResolutionResult:)**: Creates a resolution result object with the specified person resolution result object.

## Resolution Results

- **INAccountTypeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for account types.
- **INBalanceTypeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for balance types.
- **INCurrencyAmountResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a currency amount associated with an intent.
- **INPaymentAccountResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the user account that provides the funds to pay a bill.
- **INPaymentAmountResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the amount to pay for a bill.
- **INPaymentMethodResolutionResult**: Describes the result of resolving a payment method.
- **INPaymentStatusResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the payment status of a bill during a search.
- **INRequestPaymentCurrencyAmountResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the currency amount associated with a payment request.
- **INSendPaymentCurrencyAmountResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the currency amount to send to another user.
- **INSendPaymentPayeeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the recipient of a payment.

## Inherits From

- INPersonResolutionResult

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
